column5: It's been a while since I last posted here, but thought I'd update everyone on what I've been up to. Well, we bought a different trailer in our park and now we are waterfront....it fell into our laps and we just couldn't say no!  I also bought a crimping tool from Amazon and customized my own boat cover since it stays slipped all season and my bilge pump had to work overtime.  This new cover works great! I love the sunrises on this lake, so I added a few pics of that time of day and some of the fish I've caught this year.... Hard to believe we are in August already!! Hope everyone is staying well!
Congrats on the new waterfront trailer/view Cliff.
That looks like a bad rash,might want to put some extra slime on it. LOL Great to hear from you Cliff and looking young fella.
I certainly is!! Hope you're doing well!
Thanks Spiel....when it came up we had to jump on it....we bought the new one within 12 hours of seeing it and sold our old trailer one hour later for what we paid for it 5 years ago....
HAHA Brian!!  Hope you're doing well my friend!
Hey Bill!!  Hope all is well with you!
Good to hear from you cliff and jealous of the piece of heaven you got there!
Right on! Which baits worked well for bass? Had a tough go with them on southern buckhorn just now...
nothing like having home waters to work. esp if there are buckets and pike. still lots of summer left haha
looks like a great spot with some healthy looking fish!
